channel.title: Server lag Reduce program
channel.description:
NOTE:This program was offically made by Mod Dcrew Server Lag Reduce!!!!!
You can download it here: [url=http://uppit.com/Q87JZX]http://uppit.com/Q87JZX[/url]
How to make it work!!!!
[img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/1729/serverantilag.png[/img]
Make the location of your server files there: Highlighted spot.
Once you have done that and sucsessfully made the location of your server correctly choose the server type you have. For me i have a 317.
Now you will have to click The button where it says Run.... There you are... Your server should have less lag.
If there is any further questions email me at sameoldjack@hotmail.com or just PM me..
Credits!!!!
50% to Mod Dcrew - For uploading to the moparscape forums, and being a excellent friend. 50% to Me for Being kind a generous to show the world Mod Dcrews work and Helping him out.
Thanks everyone!!!!! [code]MOD DCREW FTW/BEST!!!!!!![/code] ;D
ALSO!!!!
If some of you may not be completley sure about this Program I have inserted a Image to show you that it's safe. | \/ [img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/6059/scanm.png[/img]
Thanks!!!!!

item.title: Server lag Reduce program
item.dc:creator: @shivang shivang
item.description:
@shivang wrote:

la­wl:

VIRUS DONT DL I DLED THIS AND IT CRASHED MY COMPUTER !! I have a baby sister that’s 3 years old and is sick and she sleeps in my bedroom and when u crash my computer moniter makes noices atleast every minute and she wakes up and she cry’s… not very nice?

there was no viruses in it and it actually works for me… my server would usaully dc about every 10 mins but now after i started using this it stayed up over 2 hours without dcing its still going on too (talking about 508)

Read full topic

item.title: Server lag Reduce program
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

[quote=“ryan1322, post:6, topic:266510”][quote author=gomeman link=topic=351974.msg2700489#msg2700489 date=1236559394]
The program searches secretly for bugs/lag on your system (computer) and it reduces it…

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 08, 2009, 06:55:29 pm[/size][hr]I hope you all enjoyed
[/quote]

Hmm…For some reason im thinking that explanation is bs. It probly sets the process running to a low or higher priority.[/quote]
Its made out of visual basic. I doubt it works tho. Cuz u can right now just make a anti-lag system in the server and i bet that works way better. Btw did u get permission? If not it can be closed and called leetching.

Read full topic
